messaging

Class Message

  • java.lang.Object
    • messaging.Message

  • public class Message
extends java.lang.Object
    Message is a data object class for the payload, that is the content of a message, as well as the address of its sender. A sender only sends payloads, the message object is assembled only on the receiving side.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Message(java.io.Serializable payload, java.net.InetSocketAddress sender)
      Creates a new message with the given payload and sender address.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.io.Serializable getPayload()
      Returns this message's payload.
      java.net.InetSocketAddress getSender()
      Returns the address of this message's sender.
